function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Risk of increased density of contamination in covered places with minimal ventilation due to static people","Impact":"Higher risk of contagious disease spread in these locations","Mitigation":"Improve ventilation systems, enforce mask-wearing, and limit the time people spend in static positions","Technologies":"Air purification systems, ventilation monitoring, indoor air quality sensors","People":"People in covered places with minimal ventilation, especially in static positions","Owner":"Building managers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Risk of high traffic areas showing stronger contamination heatmaps","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission in high traffic areas","Mitigation":"Implement crowd control measures, increase ventilation, and regularly disinfect high traffic areas","Technologies":"Crowd monitoring systems, automated disinfection systems, air purifiers","People":"People in high traffic areas and nearby locations","Owner":"Local authorities, transit operators"},{"Description":"Risk of social distancing violations leading to high-risk categories of individuals","Impact":"Higher likelihood of contagious disease transmission in areas with social distancing violations","Mitigation":"Implement strict enforcement of social distancing measures, provide clear guidelines, and use technology for monitoring and enforcement","Technologies":"Social distancing monitoring systems, contact tracing technology, public awareness campaigns","People":"Individuals violating social distancing measures, people in close proximity to violators","Owner":"Public health authorities, law enforcement"}]}
